summary: This collection of documents pertains to Alfonso R. Wichtrich, also known as HYDROL, and his involvement in intelligence operations in Panama and Mexico. The documents detail his recruitment, activities, capabilities, and suitability for various covert operations, as well as his contacts and networks. The documents also cover project reviews, financial authorizations, and recommendations regarding his continued engagement.
title: Operational Activities and Assessment of Alfonso R. Wichtrich (HYDROL) in Panama and Mexico
recipient: Chief, WIDE; Chief, Foreign Branch T
sender: Chief of Mission, Mexico City; Chief of Station, Panama City
